name: Kaivan Dave
description: Kaivan Dave, B.A., is a marketer, passionate branding expert, and a leader in the direct-to-consumer space. He has a degree in Marketing & Management from DePaul University. His work has been featured in The Huffington Post, Yahoo, and GQ Magazine. Kaivan speaks regularly on panels and at workshops, conferences and events nationally and internationally.

metaData.title: Kaivan Dave, Author at Awesome Smoothie

name: Kelsey Butler
description:
Kelsey Butler is a Registered Dietitian and recipe developer. Kelsey found a love for creating delicious recipes. Now, with a Master’s in Nutritional Sciences, Kelsey uses her culinary skills to create healthy and unique recipes for many different diets. She is passionate about creating a healthy relationship with all foods and recipes that everyone can enjoy.

She is an expert in nutrition research, coaching, content creation, and recipe development. Kelsey takes a mindful approach towards health and values building relationships with all foods. She understands the importance of providing recipes that anyone can enjoy, no matter their dietary needs.

When she’s not focusing on nutrition, Kelsey has a passion for cooking, the outdoors, running, and travel.

metaData.title: Kelsey Butler, MS, RDN, Author at Awesome Smoothie
metaData.description: Kelsey Butler is a Registered Dietitian Nutritionist with a Master’s in Nutrition Sciences. She is an expert in nutrition research, coaching, content creation, and recipe development.
